sub_title: UX Designer, Gamification Expert & UX Copywriter looking for remote work (based in Ecuador)
summary:
I am Wesley. Expert in persuasive design. I help you create solutions that solve the right problems. To discover the behavioural patterns that make or break your service. The patterns you need to influence to be successful. 

Understand the problem before committing to a solution. With analytical and creative thinking, I challenge you to look at your challenges from the perspective of your user. To understand why they behave as they do. And to create new concepts that will inspire (new) behaviour and improve your service. 

With an applicable model we’ll squeeze all the value that behavioural psychology and gamification has to offer to transform your service into a persuasive experience that people will love. 

I’ve been able to do so for clients like ING Bank, EY, Zwijssen and UMCU as well as award-winning start-ups like SafeDrivePod and Mobietrain.

I desire to inspire, not just influence. To persuade and not coerce. To motivate, not force. Persuasive design allows me to speak to people’s intrinsic desire and purpose with concepts and solutions. To empower people to engage in and enjoy what they do. To grow and succeed. For learners, employees or clients. From apps to workshops, onboarding, learning experiences or articles. I can help you build a better experience.

projects:
[{'title': 'AWARD WINNING || SafeDrivePod - Product and Service Design || 2018-19', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': "From negative experience to epic mission to change the world. With SafeDrivePod we applied the power of gamification, design and playful copywriting to turn their technical solution into a positive user experience. 

I was responsible for creating the gamification concept and writing the copy for the playful host Clive. 

Their steady growth and new redesign led to winning the Fleet Safety Awards 2018. And the users? They've booked over 88 million safe kilometers.", 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Wesley', 'last_name': 'Smit', 'name': None, 'headline': 'UX Designer, Gamification Expert & UX Copywriter looking for remote work (based in Ecuador)'}]}, {'title': 'AWARD-WINNING || Mobietrain - Creating a Micro-learning Platform || 2017 - 2019', 'date': {'start': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'description': 'How do you make an award-winning micro-learning? From beginning to end, we have guided start-up Mobietrain to develop a new, powerful learning platform for wonderful clients like BMW and Albert Heijn. 

We created a smooth, motivating experience leaning on intrinsic motivation for long-term use. I was able to leverage the power of gamification with a focus on self-improvement and mastery instead of points. Next to creating the reward system and the UX, I helped to create the various learning formats. I also translated their content to micro-learning questions and videos, and helped them out with some voice-over work for the animations. 

Our effort was a part of the puzzle that helped Mobietrain win the HR Tech Solution of the Year Award 2019. 

After the 1st phase, we helped Mobietrain to take the next step. I analysed the current strengths of their experience, spotted opportunities for improvement, create new learning formats and wrote a plan to take the UX and gamification to a higher level. ', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Wesley', 'last_name': 'Smit', 'name': None, 'headline': 'UX Designer, Gamification Expert & UX Copywriter looking for remote work (based in Ecuador)'}]}]
